Harry Potter: I would choose Harry Potter because he is one of the most beloved and iconic characters in literature. He is brave, loyal, and has a strong sense of justice. He is also a great leader and has the ability to inspire others.

Wonder Woman: I would choose Wonder Woman because she is a powerful and independent character who embodies strength and courage. She is a warrior who fights for justice and peace, and she is also a great role model for young girls.

The Doctor: I would choose the Doctor because he is a time-traveling alien who has been around for centuries. He is a brilliant and curious character who has seen and experienced many different things. He is also a great problem solver and has the ability to adapt to any situation.

Elsa: I would choose Elsa because she is a strong and powerful character who has been misunderstood and underestimated. She has the ability to control ice and snow, and she is also a great leader. She is also a great role model for young girls who may feel like they don't fit in.

Frodo Baggins: I would choose Frodo Baggins because he is a brave and selfless character who is willing to do whatever it takes to protect his friends and the world. He is also a great leader and has the ability to inspire others. He is also a great role model for young boys who may feel like they don't have the strength or courage to make a difference.
